ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.paragraph1: Founded in 2020, Get Your Trip began with a simple mission: to make travel planning effortless and enjoyable. What started as a small team of travel enthusiasts has grown into a trusted name in the travel industry, helping thousands of travelers discover the world's most beautiful destinations.
ourStory.paragraph2: We believe that travel has the power to change lives, broaden perspectives, and create lasting memories. That's why we're committed to providing exceptional service, carefully curated experiences, and personalized attention to every traveler who books with us.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our tours and services.

booking.question: How do I book a tour?
booking.answer: You can book a tour directly through our website by selecting your desired tour and following the booking process. Alternatively, you can contact our customer service for assistance.

cancellation.question: What is your cancellation policy?
cancellation.answer: We offer free cancellation up to 7 days before your scheduled tour. Cancellations made within 7 days of the tour date may be subject to a fee. Please check the specific tour details for more information.

whatToBring.question: What should I bring on the tour?
whatToBring.answer: We recommend bringing comfortable walking shoes, weather-appropriate clothing, a water bottle, sunscreen, and a camera. Specific tours may have additional recommendations which will be provided in your booking confirmation.

children.question: Are your tours suitable for children?
children.answer: Most of our tours are family-friendly and suitable for children. However, some tours may have age restrictions due to safety concerns. Please check the tour details or contact us for specific information.

privateTours.question: Do you offer private tours?
privateTours.answer: Yes, we offer private tours for individuals and groups. Private tours can be customized according to your preferences and schedule. Please contact us for more information and pricing.
